title: Maharani Diamond and Emerald Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: South Sea Pearls (AAA Grade). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram features intricate floral and paisley motifs meticulously crafted with brilliant cut diamonds. The center pendant showcases a larger emerald surrounded by a diamond halo, leading to a second ornate pendant embellished with more diamonds and gracefully dangling South Sea pearls. The necklace's design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern, lightweight structure for comfortable wear. Features the elegant scrollwork typical of South Indian jewelry, but with a lighter, more contemporary feel.
occasions: and other special occasions. Suitable for brides (pellikuturu) and can be worn during muhurtham
or other grand celebrations. Also makes a stunning statement piece for high-end social events.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure exceptional brilliance and value. The South Sea pearls add a touch of classic sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting, radiant shine. A timeless piece that will be treasured for generations. Designed for comfort and wearability while maintaining a luxurious look.
